alert.note: Alert for Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 06 at 8:12PM EDT until May 07 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Pickaway County, Ohio. * WHEN...Until 1215 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 811 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported minor flooding in the advisory area, with several roads still closed in southeastern Pickaway County. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Laurelville, Tarlton, Whisler and Pickaway County Airport.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
